title: Laplace/Tandem Bridging Grant
abstractText: This request is for bridging funding required in the short term leading to the NASA/ESA decision between a Jupiter/Europa or Titan/Enceladus mission as the next Flagship/L-class outer planetary mission. This funding will enable the UK planetary community to continue to play its leading role in defining the science objectives, mission requirements and areas of technology required in order to fly a successful space mission to the outer planets.
